page.title: 07HILL FARM, THURGARTON
page.content: The{Boots' Company}farm the{1000 } acres which comprise virtually the whole of this block which is out of the Trent Valley i.e.the N.W. corner. Three farms have been amalgamated and are now operated from{Hill Farm. } Business methods dominate with efficiency at a premium.The whole enterprise is run by a manager,two cowmen,two tractor drivers,a young woman relief to both, and part-time help from the retired ex-manager. The land,being of sticky clay,is much heavier than in the valley.{Half} this land is given over to{wheat,}the grain being sold as a cash crop for { bread}making.The other{500 acres}is used for{grazing or grass growing}for the cows.Up to 4000 tons of{silage}are made every year by taking the hay,pickling it in acid and keeping it under plastic sheets for winter feed.
